transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Thank you for calling Battery Smart! My name is Priya. How may I help you today?

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Battery Plant is the facility where we manufacture the swap‑ready batteries used across our network. Let me check on that for more details.

transcript.speaker: customer
transcript.text: how do you have your battery in real life

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: You get a fully charged, swap‑ready battery at any of our 500+ stations—just ride in, swap in 30 seconds, and you’re ready to go.

formatted_transcript:
Agent: Thank you for calling Battery Smart! My name is Priya. How may I help you today?

Customer: what is battery plant

Agent: Battery Plant is the facility where we manufacture the swap‑ready batteries used across our network. Let me check on that for more details.

Customer: how do you have your battery in real life

Agent: You get a fully charged, swap‑ready battery at any of our 500+ stations—just ride in, swap in 30 seconds, and you’re ready to go.
